data.name: Tiny-Tasy Town Demo
data.detailed_description:
In the game, the player plays a young man who has just acquired his own territory. The land was full of weeds and the monsters. The Player need to collect a variety of resources to build various facilities to enrich their own town. In order to attract all kinds of residents and adventurers to live in the town.

In the game, the player needs to find various puzzle pieces distributed in the world and learn how to make buildings and other items from puzzles.And the player need to pay attention to the town. There are various travelers and adventurers coming to the town from all around the world. For travelers, if the player be friendly with them, they can be persuaded to settle in the town, work and live here, and then the player can get rich taxes from the residents.

You can enjoy adventure, build, collection here.

Adventure


This is a magical world. People living here call it the Gaea Continent. There are various magical energies in this world. There are various magical creatures and beasts living and fighting on the mainland.

Build


Players can freely build various buildings, square decorations, flower beds, and fences here. The rich construction will also make the town more prosperous.

Collection


There are a variety of jigsaw puzzles, architecture, and adventure props in the game design, as well as various adventurers with strange characters in the game.

data.supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI 5770,Nvidia GeForce GTX 460
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX1050+

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: MacOs Sierra 10+
  • Processor: 2.6 GHz Intel Core i3
  • Graphics: Intel Iris 1536 MB
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: MacOs High Sierra+
  • Processor: 3.0 GHz Intel Core i5
  • Graphics: Radeon Pro 555

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
